description.displayText: Jessica was a nanny for our newborn for 4 months.  The only reason we didn't have her longer is because we actually already had a family friend nanny lined up to start but she wasn't available until August and we needed somebody to start in May.  I came on Care.com to find a temporary nanny and still can't believe how lucky we were to have found Jessica.  She was incredible with our baby.  She loved on him like he was her own and did awesome age-appropriate activities with him - even gave me suggestions on things to have at home for his activity time.  She was extremely punctual and flexible even when I suddenly would need to work extended hours in a given day.  She was such a genuinely kind and caring person and it was so incredibly hard on her last day with us.  She was such a blessing to our family. I would highly recommend Jessica.  She never called in sick, ways ALWAYS early and was just amazing with our child.  I love how she interacted with our baby and how much she helped us.

description.displayText: Jessica nannied for us and another family for 15 months (from 3mo to 18mo).  She always showed up on time and was very communicative if running late.  She also was very engaged with the kids and took such great care of them!  Never worried when my son was with her.  Highly recommend!!!

She also was very engaged with the kids and took such great care of them!  Never worried when my son was with her.  Highly recommend!!!

description.displayText: Jessica is a loving, soft spoken person. She's very knowledgeable in caring and teaching children of all ages. In a school or home setting.
description.originalText: Jessica is a loving, soft spoken person. She's very knowledgeable in caring and teaching children of all ages. In a school or home setting.

description.displayText: Jessica is a loving and caring person who adores children. She's very nurturing and goes above and beyond to help people. She is a dependable person and will always give her best at any task. Her interaction with the children and parents is always a joy to watch. I'm certain that any family that invites her into their home won't be disappointed. She's the best!
